DOC.brief_summary: The study enroll 68 overweight male female subject high ( > 2 3dl-can soda/day ) consumption sweeten beverage per day . After run-in period 4 week , subject randomize either 12-week intervention arm sweeten beverage replace artificially sweeten , calorie-free beverage , control arm . The following measurement perform end run-in period end intervention period - intrahepatic fat concentration - visceral fat volume - change day-long metabolic profile baseline ( plasma glucose , insulin , triglyceride concentration ) - change food intake daily energy , carbohydrate sugar intake baseline
